item.title: Exercises
item.description: Exercises Service: Spring Todo MVC Questions & Answers What is the purpose of systemd? CLICK FOR ANSWER Create and manage services. What is systemctl? CLICK FOR ANSWER The CLI package that allows for managing services. What is a unit file? CLICK FOR ANSWER A service definition file. It configures the service and dictates how the service behaves and how it is managed by systemd.
